name: Tileland (Philliam)
description:
Description

Tileland is a 2d sandbox game where you play in a procedurally generated world with many different biomes. Collect tiles and resources to build and craft tools and other items, your newly crafted items or tools can be used to help you survive, gather tiles and resources faster, and build new things.

Controls

Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

Press the left mouse button to attack mobs and destroy tiles.

Press the right mouse button to place tiles.

Press 'k' to switch the layer that you edit(place and destroy) tiles on.

Press 'e' to open the inventory.

Press 'c' to open the crafting menu.

Use arrow keys to navigate menus.

Press 'enter' to select the selected option in a menu.

Press 'F3'  to toggle the debug menu.

Press 'o' to save the game. Note that you can only have one save at a time so saving when you already have a save will override your previous save.

Press 'p' to load a save.

Press 'F11' to toggle fullscreen.

Development

Tileland is an indie game developed by me(Philliam).  Currently, the game is in early alpha development but updates are released regularly so there will not be long until the game leaves the alpha state. I am aware that the game has a few bugs and some features are barebones but I promise that with time this will change. Please leave feedback, ideas, and bugs that need to be fixed in the comments, thank you.
